name: Grilled Jerk Wings
description: Use your favourite Epicure Wing Seasoning for these grilled chicken wings that can feed a crowd!

ingredients.name: Jerk Chicken Wing Seasoning or Lemon Pepper Wing Seasoning

preparation:
1. Preheat grill to medium heat.
  2. Place wings in a large bowl. Drizzle with oil, then sprinkle with seasoning. Stir to evenly coat.
  3. Place wings on grill, leaving space in between for even cooking. Cook with lid closed 3–5 min per side, or until chicken is cooked through.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup chopped veggies and 1 grilled pita.
